pkgmetadata.longdescription: ======fx-lib======Frank Xu(FX)'s personal FX common lib in PythonInstall-------- .. code-block:: bash pip install git+https://github.com/frankyxhl/py_fx_lib or .. code-block:: bash pip install fx-libLog Module---------- .. code-block:: python import logging from fx_lib.log import setup_logging setup_logging(".sync.logging.yaml", default_level=logging.DEBUG) log = logging.getLogger("frank") # Usage # log.info("Hello, World")Email Module------------ .. code-block:: python from fx_lib.zoho_email import Email # Usage # with Email.read_config() as e: # e.send("Email Title", "Content")Example**********************Please check here `Config example file <docs/log_config_example.yaml>`_=======History=======0.1.0 (2019-07-28)------------------* First release on PyPI.
